fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 36.60 points or 0.19% to settle at 19,342.65. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.39% to 12.23. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
